item.title: 100 vehicles pile up in Michigan crash as snowstorm moves across the country
item.description: More than 100 vehicles smashed into each other or slid off the interstate in Michigan as snow fueled by the Great Lakes blanketed the state

item.title: What's open and closed on Martin Luther King Jr. Day
item.description: Government offices, the stock market and many schools are closed Monday in observance of the Martin Luther King Jr. Day, but most businesses are open
